summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 4, University Heights Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between 14th Avenue Northeast and 15th Avenue Northeast; from East 52nd Street to East 55th Street, by grading the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 33280 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
